content: A nationally recognized body of preeminent public and private sector leaders in Weather and Climate

The Weather Climate Enterprise (WCE) External Advisory Board is a nationally recognized group of preeminent public and private sector leaders who provide strategic advice, direction and recommendations in support of the University at Albanyâ€™s leading weather and climate research and training programs with the goal of building a more resilient, weather and climate ready state and nation for the 21st Century.
